start_message: Welcome! ğŸ‘‹ I am your assistant bot, ready to help you navigate the world of staking on Starknet. Get real-time updates right here! Commands: /start - start using the bot /help - get help /language - change the language /add_info - add staking information about a validator or delegator /delete_info - delete staking information about a validator or delegator /get_validator_info - get validator information /get_full_info - get full staking information /get_reward_info - get full reward information /contact_admin - contact the administrator /set_reward_notification - set a reward notification /disable_reward_notification - disable reward notification /show_reward_notification - show current reward notification information
help_message: ğŸ“œ List of available commands: /start - start using the bot /help - get help /language - change the language /add_info - add staking information about a validator or delegator /delete_info - delete staking information about a validator or delegator /get_validator_info - get information about a specific validator /get_full_info - get full staking information (after /add_info) /get_reward_info - get full reward information (after /add_info) /contact_admin - contact the administrator /set_reward_notification - set a reward notification (after /add_info) /disable_reward_notification - disable reward notification /show_reward_notification - show current reward notification information
